CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper March 2, 1957, pg. 1, reads: "Cries for Children - Mrs. Essie Talbert, whom the police are seeking for abandoning her seven children, cries while telling newsmen that she can't find a decent place for her family to live. She says assistance check was stopped. She left them alone while she went hunting for food and money. Her landlady also says such situations should be handled by the community. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Essie Talbert crying into handkerchief due to difficulty in finding affordable housing for her family
